CustomField.description: This field is populated automatically. It is a Roll Up Summary used to calculate how many Product State Configs have "LLC_BI__Is_Ready_to_Transmit__c" checked. This value is limited to 10, as that is the number of "states" that can be recorded in the LLC_BI__Product_State_Config_Pivot__c table.
CustomField.label: Product State Rdy to Transmit Config Cnt
